name: NecoArcCharacter
title: Neco-Arc Character
author: FuryoftheStars, username9999
description:
This mod replaces your character with Neco-Arc! Contains a fully animated character with all 1 level of armor and custom color masks.

Has compatibility with other mods that make changes to the character (reach, flashlight, etc) and with character selector mods, like miniMAXIme.
